meanings.definition: One who hides or conceals something.
meanings.sent1: The hider stayed quiet in the bushes.
meanings.sent2: The hider found a good spot behind the tree.
meanings.sent3: The hider played a fun game of hide-and-seek with friends.
meanings.sent4: The hider was like a shadow, unseen by anyone.
meanings.sent5: The hider's skill at concealing objects was unmatched.

meanings.definition: To put or keep out of sight; conceal from view.
meanings.sent1: She tried to hider her surprise when he jumped out to scare her.
meanings.sent2: He would hider the treasure in a secret compartment.
meanings.sent3: The magician would hider objects in his sleeves during the show.
meanings.sent4: The clouds would hider the sun's rays on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The detective would hider important evidence from the suspect.
